name: Unravel Cyndy
detailed_description:
Unravel Cyndy is a jigsaw puzzle game, containing 64 sexy and sexual 3D CGI renders of beautiful, sexy ladies.
The game has a set of cool features:

  • 9 different stories, each containing 7 different images.
  • Rising difficulty: each story start from a 4x4 puzzle working up to a 10x10
  • Autosave on Quit. Once you have completed an image it will be saved as completed.
  • Image Galery: Once you have completed an image you will be able to see it here.
  • Score system: Completing each image gives you points, depending on the difficulty of the image.
  • HINT system: IF you are stuck, just use the HINT button, this will highlight the correct place for a selected puzzle. This comes at a price, each time you use it, 2 points will be deducted from the points you get for completing that image.
  • 7 chill soundtracks, picked for a nice, relaxing experience. If you like you can always stop the music in the Options Menu.
For the best experience, I recommend playing the game in full-screen mode, as the images were created for 1080p resolutions.


This game has been built as a side project, spin-off out of Cyndy, also available here, on Steam.

short_description: Unravel Cyndy is a jigsaw puzzle game, containing 64 sexy and sexual 3D CGI renders, featuring cool and relaxing gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or above
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains images of sexual nature. This game is for adults only. This game depicts sexual acts.
